generator: 1 { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- workshop(W). 1 { scheduled(W, R, Sl) : room(R), slot(Sl) } :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check to make sure two different workshops don't try to occupy the same room at the same time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, Sl), scheduled(W2, R, Sl), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Don't overwork the rooms; we've got a hard cap of two sessions per room for the whole day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: { scheduled(W, R, Sl) : workshop(W), slot(Sl) } 2 :- room(R).

hard_constraints.description: DevOps crew is strictly midday only. Don't even try to schedule them in the morning or afternoon.
Keep the Data workshops out of Room 3. It's a no-go for that topic.
UI and Data are mutually exclusive time-wise. They can't run concurrently across any rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, _, Sl), scheduled(W2, _, Sl), topicOf(W1, "UI"), topicOf(W2, "Data").

hard_constraints.description: Make sure we're actually covering every topic. We need at least one session for each to call it a success.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: occurs(T) :- scheduled(W, _, _), topicOf(W, T). :- topic(T), not occurs(T).

soft_constraints.description: Let's be efficient and minimize the number of idle room-slots so we're not just paying for empty space.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: used(R, Sl) :- scheduled(_, R, Sl). idle(R, Sl) :- room(R), slot(Sl), not used(R, Sl). #minimize { 1, R, Sl : idle(R, Sl) }.
